resources.string: Could not create log file. Make sure the SD card is available.
Choose a field to export to KML
No connection tests have been done on a mobile connection.

The following summary lists the mobile cells and wifi access points, and their connection test results. For each cell or access point, you can see the %% of connection tests which succeeded, and the number of attempted connection tests. 

The worst cells or access points are at the top of the list. 

Dates of data collection: 
%1$s.
Attached is a file with the full data of all tests.\n\n
